issue.title: [C++] Provide thread id accessors
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12641](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12641). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Sometimes, a worker thread must identify its thread id within a ThreadPool (for example, to support safe concurrent access to per-thread state). We could use `std::this_thread::get_id()` for this, but this is less convenient for indexing into a container of per-thread state.
